original_title: The Jimi Hendrix Experience - Miami Pop Festival
overview: May 18th, 1968 The Jimi Hendrix Experience headlined the Miami Pop Festival with an absolutely amazing performance and now you can see some of the recently uncovered footage. The film of the live performance at Miami Pop scattered with still frames of the band performing throughout their career. Watch above and marvel at the effortless stage presence and energy exuded by Hendrix.
title: The Jimi Hendrix Experience - Miami Pop Festival
